Class SimpleFileManager

java.lang.Object
  es.usal.bicoverlapper.data.files.SimpleFileManager
Direct Known Subclasses:
CompleteFileManager
public class SimpleFileManager
extends java.lang.Object

This Manager just converts a file to a LinkedList with the lines in the file, or a LinkedList of strings to a file NOTE: This class is to be deprecated

Author:
Rodrigo Santamaria
